title: Very Irresistible
content:

Looking for this font used for Givenchy print campaign.  
Thx in advance

Hello

Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017052910/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
that's about as close as i saw. not a match, but might be useful for whatever project you're after. maybe they just modified it for this use? add some serifs, pull out the bowls a bit...
